thread.title: Khloe Kardashian goes naked for cover of her new book
thread.title_full: Khloe Kardashian goes naked for cover of her new book

author: Wires English | Indo-Asian News Service
title: Khloe Kardashian goes naked for cover of her new book
text:
Khloe Kardashian goes naked for cover of her new book By Indo-Asian News Service on October 23, 2015 at 6:31 AM Comments 
Reality TV personality Khloe Kardashian has bared it all for the cover image of her upcoming memoir “Strong Looks Better Naked.” The “Keeping Up with the Kardashians” star puts her bare derriere on full display but opts to cover her private parts with white sheet, reports aceshowbiz.com. 
She flaunts her enviable curves while striking a seductive pose to the camera. The star lies down on a white bed while giving a sultry stare to the camera. She puts her bare derriere on full display but opts to cover her private parts with white sheet. 
The book includes how-to advice and lifestyle tips in addition to stories about Khloe’s struggles with weight, relationships and her self-image. The reality star has lost at least 35 pounds due to her healthy lifestyle. 
Regarding her breakup with basketball player Lamar Odom, Khloe reportedly writes that it was due to his drinking and drug abuse issues. At the end of the book, Khloe reportedly thanks him for some of the best years of her life. ”Before I met you I felt invisible, and after I felt seen,” she writes. 
The book is set to be released on November 3. 
  6:44 AM Topics:
